Title: Authorizes the village of Greenwood Lake, county of Orange to allow golf carts on certain streets
Summary: Authorizes the village of Greenwood Lake, county of Orange to allow golf carts on certain streets under the exclusive control and jurisdiction of such village.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law, in relation to authorizing the village of Greenwood Lake, county of Orange to allow golf carts on certain streets
